productsClickable.title: BXManufacturing Clera 65" 4K UHD LED TV

protection.title: Add a BXRetail Protection Plan
protection.content:
Enhance your manufacturer warranty and get extended coverage when the warranty ends, including:
  • We make house calls to repair TVs 42" and larger.
  • If your screen has bad pixels, we'll correct it.
  • If your TV won't work because of a power surge, we'll fix it.
  • You'll never pay for parts and labor on covered repairs. No hidden fees.

mounting.title: Add Mounting and Professional Services
mounting.content: Hassle-free setup from our BXRetail Installation pros.
mounting.option1: Delivery + Premium TV Mounting 56" and larger (Mount, Connect, and Setup included), $199.00
mounting.option2: Delivery + TV Connect and Setup 56" and larger (Connect and Setup only), $129.00

productsClickable.confirmationSubtitle: Thanks for your purchase. You'll receive an email confirmation. See the options below to schedule your delivery and Professional Services appointment.

productsClickable.title: Streamstick Video Streaming Player with 4K, Full HD

protection.title: Add a BXRetail Protection Plan
protection.content:
Enhance your manufacturer warranty and get extended coverage when the warranty ends, including:
  • If your video accessory won’t turn on because of a power surge, we'll fix it.
  • If the remote that came with your video accessory stops working, we'll replace it.
  • If there's a failure from normal wear and tear, we'll repair it.
  • You'll never pay for parts and labor on covered repairs. No hidden fees.

productsClickable.confirmationSubtitle: Thanks for your purchase. You'll receive an email confirmation including the details of your protection plan.
